name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Ninja - Boost Productivity with Pomodoro

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Ninja gives your new tab a fresh look with a Pomodoro timer, to-do list, lofi music, and custom sessions for better focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü•∑ Focus Ninja - Transform your boring new tab into a productivity powerhouse.
Featuring a Pomodoro timer, relaxing lofi music, and a to-do list, all while giving your new tab an awesome, cool look with live themes.

üìù About:
Why settle for a dull, cluttered new tab when you can turn it into a sleek, organized productivity hub? Focus Ninja combines a Pomodoro timer, curated lofi beats, and a task manager into one beautiful interface that transforms your new tab into a tool for deep work and focus. With its live themes, it gives your browser a fresh, aesthetic vibe.

‚è≥ How it works:
Add tasks to your to-do list.
Select your session duration (15-90 minutes) using the time slider.
Start your session with beautiful live background themes and matching lofi music.
When the timer ends, take a break and recharge!

‚ú® Key Features:
Pomodoro timer ‚è≤Ô∏è to organize your work and rest cycles.
To-do list ‚úÖ for planning and tracking tasks.
Customizable session durations from 15 to 90 minutes.
Lofi music üé∂ paired with each live background theme to enhance focus.

Stunning live backgrounds optionsüåå that give your new tab an awesome, stylish look.

Focus Ninja not only boosts productivity but also gives your new tab a cool, refreshed appearance, making it a joy to work in.
